backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining admin login, access control, storage mixins, and data models for clients, transporters, loads, tracking, and verification.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines old/new actor types and performs a no-op migration by returning the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for dependencies, build artifacts, environment files, IDE configs, and Capacitor folders.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation explaining the password-based admin auth system, token flow, route protection, and backend integration.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing them for Play Store publishing.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, web output dir, HTTPS scheme, and Android keystore build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining custom theme variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing root div and script loading the main React bundle.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Example environment file showing Android signing variable names for release builds.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Builds a debug Android APK by checking prerequisites, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleDebug.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds a signed release AAB for Play Store upload using provided keystore credentials and Gradle bundleRelease.
Builds a signed release APK for external distribution using keystore credentials and Gradle assembleRelease.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app with React Query, theme provider, router, and UI toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Displays a transporter’s submitted location evidence with timestamps, coordinates, and screenshot viewer.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Renders a list of transporters with details, live location info, status, and freshness indicators.
Provides filters for transporter list, including hiding those without location and filtering by truck type.
Shows a simple map-style list of transporters with location data, allowing marker selection for details.
Displays transporter locations with filters, map fallback handling, and a list view, using query data and memoized filtering.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an iframe preview of an ad snippet with diagnostics and error handling for load failures or empty snippets.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Shows a bottom advertisement bar based on ad settings, supports dismissal, live settings updates, and iframe preview rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Static screen informing users they lack admin access, offering navigation to home or admin login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary for admin routes that resets relevant queries and shows a recovery state on failure.
Displays an admin access error with options to retry verification or sign out and clear cached state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts unauthorized users to sign in with admin credentials and provides support contact info.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout flow with loading states, error recovery, and optional post-login callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to submit name and email and create their profile, with validation and async save handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards admin-only content by verifying admin status, handling redirects, and showing loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with company info, quick links, coverage areas, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with top navigation, routed content area, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with branding, links, login controls, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Dialog for uploading screenshot evidence and capturing geolocation before submitting load interest evidence.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons if provided.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Card enabling transporters to start or stop live location sharing with status indicators and last-update info.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: Card allowing transporters to view and update their operational status with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Utilities to read and compare the bootstrap admin principal from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: AdMob configuration, default ad snippet, and localStorage-backed ad settings management.
frontend/src/constants/adminToken.ts: Defines shared constants for admin token storage and change events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing admin access when available and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutations for granting or bootstrapping admin access and invalidates related admin verification queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token from sessionStorage and updates reactively via a custom change event.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Combines identity, user profile, role, and admin-token checks to determine authentication state, loading state, and admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages creation, loading, and lifecycle of Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient and provides context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs including contact messages, admin checks, client data, and other domain operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Handles geolocation tracking for transporters, periodically sending location updates to the backend with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile and role, enabled only when authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for a corporate-themed light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root and wraps App with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders company About page with story, mission, values, and regional coverage details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements admin dashboard with tabs for loads, users, contacts, APK link management, ads, and verification actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Provides admin login form with diagnostics, token handling, and admin verification logic.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Handles client registration form, loading existing info, and submitting registration with contract details.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact form for user messages and company contact information.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Renders a contracts dashboard allowing authenticated, verified users to create contracts and view existing ones with date validation and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the marketing homepage with hero content, testimonials, and registration links, including optional profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Implements load creation and viewing for clients and transporters, including file uploads, validations, and interest submission.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a static list of logistics services and a simple “how it works” flow for users.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Handles transporter registration and editing with document uploads, truck type selection, and contract details.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure and components using TanStack Router, including public, registration, and admin pages.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports a function that converts an array of objects into CSV text, creates a Blob, and triggers a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them from sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content scanning for the frontend project.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, feature requirements, known issues, and pending admin-related feature requests.
